title: Behind The Idea #35: Are We Sure General Motors Is A Good Value?
description: Does a relatively overvalued company mean its peers are cheap? Do peak cycle share buybacks create or destroy value? Is General Motors really all that cheap? Seeking Alpha author Blue Pacific raises concerns about the legacy auto giant, and we dissect them to see what's left for shareholders.
itunes:title: Are We Sure General Motors Is A Good Value?
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: GM may be a 'value' compared to Tesla, but is that enough?
itunes:summary: Does a relatively overvalued company mean its peers are cheap? Do peak cycle share buybacks create or destroy value? Is General Motors really all that cheap? Seeking Alpha author Blue Pacific raises concerns about the legacy auto giant, and we dissect them to see what's left for shareholders.
